product_name: Outdoor Research Supercharger Pants - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Made of stretchy, breathable Schoeller  soft-shell fabric, the women's ultralight, technical Outdoor Research Supercharger Pants are built to withstand the abuse dished out by fast ascents. Polyester stretch-woven Schoeller fabric with Nanosphere(R) technology resists wind and water and is quick drying. Low-profile waist fits comfortably under a harness. Articulated knees offer a comfortable fit and freedom of movement. Zippered rear ankle gusset lets you keep pant legs trim or expand them to fit over boots. Zippers are coated with a durable water repellent finish. Zippered fly; button front; belt loops. Zippered thigh pocket; slash front pockets. Outdoor Research Supercharger Pants have internal loops for instep lacing. Closeout.
short_description: Made of stretchy, breathable Schoeller  soft-shell fabric, the women's ultralight, technical Outdoor Research Supercharger Pants are built to withstand the abuse dished out by fast ascents.
